info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 12:59AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Beauregard and southwestern Allen Parishes through 145 AM CDT... At 1259 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Longville, or near Ragley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kinder, Oberlin, Reeves, Dry Creek, Mittie, Ragley, Longville, Harmony and Leblanc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
